name: XPOWER FC-300 Heavy Duty Industrial High Velocity Whole Room Air Mover Air Circulator Utility Shop Floor Fan, Variable Speed, Timer, 14 inch, 2100 CFM, Black, Blue
short_description: The XPOWER FC-300 is a high CFM utility fan with focused & extended airflow capable of whole room air circulation. Great for drying & cooling, especially in the home or office.
POWERFUL & EFFICIENT –2100 CFM while drawing only 1 Amps thanks to the advanced high torque motor and unique grille design for focused airflow up to 120+ feet.

CONVENIENT & VERSATILE – 4 adjustable speeds, 3-hour set-n-forget timer, and grab-n-go handle, with durable housing and heavy duty wrap-around cord design. Fully assembled, low maintenance, easy operation, and stackable.
ADVANCED TECHNOLOGY – Powerful high torque induction motor, unique spiral grille, exclusive fan blade technology, and 360-degree directional airflow.

SAFETY & SERVICE STANDARDS – ETL / CETL safety certified and comes with a 1-year limited warranty. XPOWER’s California-based customer service team offers comprehensive support, assuring a first-class customer experience.
product_description: XPOWER FC-300 Professional Grade Air Circulator Utility Fan is the ideal Heavy Duty fan for any application that requires a large volume of air movement to assist in rapid drying or ventilating. The 1/4 horsepower FC-300 comes ETL / CETL safety certified paired with advanced manufacturing technology that includes XPOWER’s 4-speed operating switch for maximized airflow control over the 2100 CFM output, 3-hour Set-N-Forget timer, a durable housing design, and a rugged rack / stand for 360-degree rotational angle. This multi-purpose fan only draws 1. 5 Amps and is equipped with advanced air fin guide technology to efficiently provide the multidirectional air movement required in your application. A 10-foot Heavy-Duty Wrap-Around-Cord Design and Grab-N-Go Handle, make transporting the FC-300 a breeze. With the lightweight and compact injection molded housing, the FC-300 can be stacked up to 5 units high for easy storage and transportation.

product_description: Dura Heat Forced Air Electric Garage Heater, 1500W PTC Ceramic, Rugged Steel Body, Thermostat, High Velocity Fan, 6 ft Power Cord, Heats Up To 250 Sq Ft, Safety Shut-Off - Garage and Greenhouse Heater This Dura Heat Electric Forced Air Heater is designed to deliver efficient and powerful warmth to your small spaces, making it an ideal choice for garages, workshops, greenhouses, or other work areas. With 1500 watts of PTC ceramic heating, this compact yet effective electric heater quickly heats areas up to 250 square feet. The unit features a rugged, steel construction built to withstand the demands of commercial use and heavy-duty environments, while its lightweight design and convenient carrying handle make it easy to transport and position wherever you need extra warmth. Equipped with an adjustable thermostat, this heater allows you to set the ideal temperature, ensuring consistent comfort in your workspace. Its high-velocity fan distributes hot air evenly, effectively circulating warmth throughout the room and making it an excellent hot air circulator. You’ll appreciate the dual functionality of this heater, as it includes both a heat setting and a fan-only mode, which lets you use the fan for air circulation during warmer months. Safety is a top priority with this Dura Heat model. It comes with an overheat shut-off feature that automatically turns the unit off if it reaches unsafe temperatures, offering peace of mind during extended use. The 6-foot power cord with a polarized plug provides ample reach for convenient placement, while the stable base stand ensures secure positioning on various surfaces. Customers love this portable ceramic heater for its reliable performance and heat output. Many have found it ideal as a small electric heater for indoor and workspace use, with its powerful fan and efficient heating elements making it especially effective in smaller rooms. Its compact design also allows it to fit comfortably in areas with limited space, adding warmth without getting in the way. Whether you need a garage heater, or a portable electric heater for your workspace, this model combines efficiency, safety, and portability in a compact package.

short_description: DIRECT TO DRY — Direct the powerful airflow of the Vornado RTR high-velocity shop fan with its 270º tilt feature. Whether you need to dry wet floors quickly, target specific areas for drying paint or finishes, or enhance overall circulation in your garage or workshop, this fan offers versatile and focused airflow to meet your needs.

DURABLE DESIGN — Engineered for durability, this high-performance circulator is built with a dust-proof and splash-resistant IP54 rated motor, ensuring reliable operation even in demanding environments. The robust, high-impact case is designed to withstand the rigors of tough jobs, making it an ideal choice for any shop or garage setting.

VERSATILE DESIGN — The fan’s versatile 270º tilt capability allows you to direct airflow precisely where it's needed. Featuring a glove-friendly switch, you can easily toggle between 3 speed settings to customize the cooling or drying effect, ensuring optimal performance for various applications.

CONVENIENT CORD STORAGE — Simplify transport and storage with the convenient flip-up cord management system. This thoughtful design keeps the power cord neatly organized, making it easy to move the fan between projects and maintain a clutter-free workspace.
SUPERIOR SUPPORT — Our standards are high, and so are your expectations. If our product doesn’t meet them, we’ll replace it, for up to 5 years. Products designed and supported in Andover, KS.
Built to meet U.S. voltage requirements. Certified, safety-tested, and warrantied for use only in the U.S.
product_description: When the job demands serious airflow, the RTR HD Heavy Duty Blower Fan delivers. Built for worksites, garages, workshops, and industrial spaces, this powerful high-velocity fan is more than a comfort accessory—it’s a professional-grade air moving tool designed to handle the toughest tasks. Whether you need to cool workers, ventilate enclosed spaces, dry floors, or speed up paint and finish curing, the RTR HD is your go-to solution. Engineered for maximum performance, the RTR HD features a 270° adjustable tilt head that directs air exactly where you need it—blast downward for rapid floor drying after mopping or flooding, angle upward to accelerate the drying of freshly painted surfaces, or aim directly across a room to ventilate and improve air circulation. This industrial blower fan moves a high volume of air, making it ideal for automotive shops, warehouses, and home improvement projects. Beyond comfort, airflow plays a critical role in safety and productivity. The RTR HD helps reduce airborne particles, dissipate fumes, and maintain a healthier, more comfortable working environment. It’s the perfect ventilation fan for projects that require constant fresh air flow, such as welding, sanding, or chemical applications. When the workday ends, the built-in flip-up cord wrap keeps the power cable neatly stored, while the durable handle makes transportation easy. Compact yet rugged, the RTR HD stores effortlessly in a work van, supply closet, or jobsite trailer until the next project. Designed for professionals but equally valuable for serious DIYers, this durable heavy-duty floor fan is backed by long-lasting performance you can rely on. From drying wet floors to cooling large rooms, the RTR HD is the ultimate air mover for anyone who needs raw power, targeted airflow, and industrial-strength durability in one hardworking package.
